languages.text: "Но это" — {n}Люссарий с заметной гордостью прикасается к челюстному импланту{/n} — "Сделано исключительно из любви к прекрасному. Ранее я увлекался поисками редких имплантов и не смог удержаться от установки сего творения, скажем так, не совсем праведных рук... Но зато какая филигранная работа, какая четкость контуров! Прошу, сохраните это в секрете от {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Адептус Механикус{/g}. Я знаю, что красные жрецы подобное не одобряют".

"But this—" {n}Lussarius touches his jaw implant, his pride evident.{/n} "—this was purely for the beauty of the thing. I used to be passionate about finding rare augmetics, and could not resist having them installed, even if they were made by, shall we say, not purely righteous hands... But the fine craftsmanship! The razor-sharp outlines! Please keep this a secret from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. I know the red priests don't condone things like that."
languages.original_text: "Но это" — {n}Люссарий с заметной гордостью прикасается к челюстному импланту{/n} — "Сделано исключительно из любви к прекрасному. Ранее я увлекался поисками редких имплантов и не смог удержаться от установки сего творения, скажем так, не совсем праведных рук... Но зато какая филигранная работа, какая четкость контуров! Прошу, сохраните это в секрете от {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Адептус Механикус{/g}. Я знаю, что красные жрецы подобное не одобряют".

traits.locale_text: "But this—" {n}Lussarius touches his jaw implant, his pride very evident{/n} "—this was purely for the beauty of it. I used to be passionate about finding rare implants, and could not resist getting them installed... Please keep this a secret from the Adeptus Mechanicus. I know the red priests don't condone things like that."

"But this—" {n}Lussarius touches his jaw implant, his pride very evident{/n} "—this was purely for the beauty of it. But the fine craftsmanship, the sharp outlines! Please keep this a secret from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. I know the red priests don't condone things like that."

"But this—" {n}Lussarius touches his jaw implant, his pride evident.{/n} "—this was purely for the beauty of the thing. I used to be passionate about finding rare augmetics, and could not resist having them installed, even if they were made by, shall we say, not purely righteous hands... But the fine craftsmanship! The razor-sharp outlines! Please keep this a secret from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. I know the red priests don't condone things like that."

languages.text: "Aber hierbei ..." {n}Lussarius berührt mit sichtlichem Stolz sein Kieferimplantat.{/n} "... hierbei ging es allein um die Schönheit des Objektes. Einst suchte ich leidenschaftlich nach seltenen Augmentationen und konnte nicht widerstehen, sie zu installieren, selbst wenn sie aus, sagen wir, nicht allzu rechtschaffener Hand stammten ... Aber die feine Handwerkskunst! Die rasiermesserscharfen Linien! Bitte erzählt dem {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} nichts davon. Ich weiß, die roten Priester billigen dergleichen nicht."
languages.original_text: "But this—" {n}Lussarius touches his jaw implant, his pride evident.{/n} "—this was purely for the beauty of the thing. I used to be passionate about finding rare augmetics, and could not resist having them installed, even if they were made by, shall we say, not purely righteous hands... But the fine craftsmanship! The razor-sharp outlines! Please keep this a secret from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. I know the red priests don't condone things like that."

traits.locale_text: "Aber hierbei ..." {n}Lussarius berührt mit sichtlichem Stolz sein Kieferimplantat.{/n} "... hierbei ging es allein um die Schönheit des Objektes. Einst suchte ich leidenschaftlich nach seltenen Augmentationen und konnte nicht widerstehen, sie zu installieren, selbst wenn sie aus, sagen wir, nicht allzu rechtschaffener Hand stammten ... Aber die feine Handwerkskunst! Die rasiermesserscharfen Linien! Bitte erzählt dem {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} nichts davon. Ich weiß, die roten Priester billigen dergleichen nicht."

"Doch das hier ..." {n}Lussarius berührt mit deutlichem Stolz sein Kieferimplantat. {/n} "... habe ich nur, weil es schön fand. Ich war ein leidenschaftlicher Sammler seltener Augmentationen und konnte nicht widerstehen, sie auch einbauen zu lassen. Bitte sagt das nicht dem {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Ich weiß, die roten Priester schätzen so etwas gar nicht."

languages.text: « Quant à ceci... » {n}Lussarius touche son augmentation mandibulaire, visiblement fier.{/n} « C'était uniquement pour des raisons esthétiques. Autrefois, j'étais passionné par les augmétiques rares. Je ne pouvais pas résister à l'envie de m'en faire installer, même s'ils provenaient d'artisans au passé, disons... douteux. Mais comment ignorer de tels chefs-d'œuvre ? Fermer les yeux devant leurs contours acérés ? Je vous en prie, ne dites rien à l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Je sais que les prêtres rouges n'approuvent pas ce genre de pratiques. »
languages.original_text: "But this—" {n}Lussarius touches his jaw implant, his pride evident.{/n} "—this was purely for the beauty of the thing. I used to be passionate about finding rare augmetics, and could not resist having them installed, even if they were made by, shall we say, not purely righteous hands... But the fine craftsmanship! The razor-sharp outlines! Please keep this a secret from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. I know the red priests don't condone things like that."

languages.text: “不过这个——”{n}卢萨利乌斯指着下巴上的植入物，带着明显自豪的表情开了口。{/n}“——就纯粹出于审美喜好了。以前，我非常热衷于寻找稀有的植入物，还会忍不住把这些东西安在身上。虽然这些造物，这么说吧，并不完全算是由正派人士造出来的……不过看看它们的做工！看看那锋芒毕露的线条！这件事情还希望您能向{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}机械修会{/g}保密，我知道，那些红袍神甫绝对不会容忍这种行为。”
languages.original_text: "But this—" {n}Lussarius touches his jaw implant, his pride evident.{/n} "—this was purely for the beauty of the thing. I used to be passionate about finding rare augmetics, and could not resist having them installed, even if they were made by, shall we say, not purely righteous hands... But the fine craftsmanship! The razor-sharp outlines! Please keep this a secret from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. I know the red priests don't condone things like that."

languages.text: «Pero esto...». {n}Lussarius se toca el implante de mandíbula, claramente orgulloso.{/n} «Esto fue puramente por su belleza. Antes me apasionaban los auméticos raros y no podía evitar la tentación de instalármelos, aunque sus autores no fueran precisamente un dechado de pureza... Pero ¡menuda artesanía! ¡Esas esbeltas y afiladas siluetas! Por favor, no se lo diga al {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Sé que los sacerdotes rojos no lo ven con buenos ojos».
languages.original_text: "But this—" {n}Lussarius touches his jaw implant, his pride evident.{/n} "—this was purely for the beauty of the thing. I used to be passionate about finding rare augmetics, and could not resist having them installed, even if they were made by, shall we say, not purely righteous hands... But the fine craftsmanship! The razor-sharp outlines! Please keep this a secret from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. I know the red priests don't condone things like that."

languages.text: 「ですがこれ…」{n}ルッサリウスは自慢げに顎のインプラントに触れた。{/n}「…これは純粋に美しさのためだけのものです。かつては珍しいオーグメティックを見つけることに情熱を燃やしていて、たとえそれが、まあ正義とは言い難い手によって作られたものであっても、どうしても取り付けずにはいられなかったのです…この精巧な職人技！鋭く際立つ輪郭！どうかこのことは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}帝国技術局{/g}には内緒にしてください。赤の司祭たちはこういうことを許さないと知っていますから」
languages.original_text: "But this—" {n}Lussarius touches his jaw implant, his pride evident.{/n} "—this was purely for the beauty of the thing. I used to be passionate about finding rare augmetics, and could not resist having them installed, even if they were made by, shall we say, not purely righteous hands... But the fine craftsmanship! The razor-sharp outlines! Please keep this a secret from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. I know the red priests don't condone things like that."

「ですが、これ…」{n}ルッサリウスは自慢げに顎のインプラントに触れた。{/n}「…これは純粋に美しさのためだけのものです。かつては珍しいオーグメティックを見つけることに情熱を燃やしていて、どうしても取り付けずにはいられなかったのです…どうかこのことは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}帝国技術局{/g}には内緒にしてください。赤の司祭たちはこういうことを許さないと知っていますから」

languages.text: "Ama şu..." {n}Lussarius, gururlu bir tavırla çene implantına dokunuyor.{/n} "Tamamen estetik sebeplerden yaptırdım. Eskiden nadir ogmetikleri bulmaya takıntılıydım ve taktırmadan duramazdım. Kirli ellerce yapılmış olsalar bile hatta. Yeter ki işçiliği ince olsun! Hatları jilet gibi keskin olsun! Lütfen bunu {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus'a{/g} söylemeyin. Kızıl rahipler böyle şeyleri hiç hoş karşılamaz."
languages.original_text: "But this—" {n}Lussarius touches his jaw implant, his pride evident.{/n} "—this was purely for the beauty of the thing. I used to be passionate about finding rare augmetics, and could not resist having them installed, even if they were made by, shall we say, not purely righteous hands... But the fine craftsmanship! The razor-sharp outlines! Please keep this a secret from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. I know the red priests don't condone things like that."
